_comments.id: Unique identifier for the announcement. Change this when creating a new announcement to reset dismissal status for all users.
_comments.active: Set to true to show the announcement, false to hide it completely.
_comments.title: Bold heading text displayed first in the announcement.
_comments.message: Main announcement text displayed after the title.
_comments.link: Optional. Remove entire 'link' object if no button needed. 'text' is button label, 'url' is destination.
_comments.dismissible: Set to true to allow users to close the announcement, false to make it permanent until you disable it.
